title: Plex Media Server
description: Stream all your stuff to all your devices, anywhere.

env.name: TZ
env.label: Time Zone
env.description: Set the timezone inside the container. For example: Europe/London. The complete list can be found here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones
